title: 'The most incredible display of aurora I've ever seen in my 20 years of flying'. Pilot captures historic northern lights show from 37,000 feet (photos)
description: The photos were taken during a severe G4 geomagnetic storm, one of the strongest in years.
content: The photos were taken during a severe G4 geomagnetic storm, one of the strongest in years.
